title: Example Blog
summary: Demonstrates how images declared in JSON appear as hero, inline, and bottom gallery media on a post page.
body:
This entry exists to document the JSON image workflow. It walks through declaring hero, inline, and bottom figures so the rendering pipeline can frame them just like the rest of the site.

Each image below references the same placeholder artwork. In a real post you would swap in distinct files, but the structure stays the same.

Future posts can add as many images as they need, mixing positions and widths to suit the story.

images.caption: Inline placement reuses the same artwork to keep the demo self-contained.

images.caption: Bottom placement shows how captions appear beneath framed images.
